title: The Onee-chan Meeting~
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>S-, such a self-indulgent behavior.... Lazing around in your casual wear in the daytime....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s okay once in a while~. Here, some matcha pudding<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh, did you make this yourself, Kanata-san....? I’ll gratefully accept it. *munch*.... This is happiness.... I just want to taste this forever....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yes, that’s right, lazing around is the best, right~. Hey, let’s have an onee-chan meeting today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>An onee-chan meeting.... I don’t mind, but what would be the agenda?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Let’s make it about「What makes our sisters so lovely」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kanata-san.... I didn’t know you could make such an insane suggestion like that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeeh!? Why-!? You love Ruby-chan too, don’t you, Dia-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s exactly why! There’s no way we’d be done with the time we have today. Let’s schedule this agenda well in advance. Let’s see.... How about separating it into 3 meetings?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Let’s make it 5. Kanata feels like Kanata won’t run out of stuff to talk about either....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
